text:
@WhiteHouse @PressSec This quote is devastating: “This is such a rapidly moving infection that losing a few days is bad, and losing a couple of weeks is terrible,” Jha said. “Losing 2 months is close to disastrous, and that’s what we did.” 

https://t.co/8lsLWaxzIX
